entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A magical entity that protects against dementors, described as 'quite some' by Harry.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Magical entities that are affected by Patronus, mentioned as not being present in the field.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: A person who is a teacher at Hogwarts, described as 'shaken and pleased'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as excitedly talking to Professor Lupin.

entities.name: mr. malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student and member of a wealthy pure-blood family, described as being frightened by Harry's Patronus.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: A Slytherin student and friend of Malfoy, mentioned as lying on the ground with others.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: A Slytherin student and friend of Malfoy, mentioned as lying on the ground with others.

entities.name: marcus flint
entities.description: The Slytherin team Captain, mentioned as being present in a crumpled heap on the ground.

relationships.description: Harry's Patronus protects against dementors, as mentioned by Professor Lupin.
Harry's Patronus frightens Mr. Malfoy, as described in the text.
Professor Lupin is affected by dementors, but his presence also affects them.
Harry possesses a Patronus, which he uses to protect against dementors.
